Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
29.04.2013 JH SCR18105 Removed external flag
21.04.2011 JOH SCR16392 Replaced GNRL_CURRENCY by ADMN_CURRENCY
and GB002 by GB902
05.08.2010 GB Changed value of the parameter PI.AMOUNT
03.06.2010 GB SCR15539 Replacement calls the BMQ002 by the BMQ005
31.12.2009 GB SCR15208 Changed functionality according to the specification
15.09.2009 GB Added call GB002 for V.Totalinterest
27.04.2007 SH SCR12484 Added BMQ002.PI.DATE = null
26.07.2005 SH SCR8547 Added new arguments for BMQ002, both skipped
-- Initialize working fields
... 105 = Banks / interest reservations
-- Clear previous selection
-- Create new selection
-- If PI.ADMNO and PI.LEDG_NO > 0 delete only TMBI rows for this ledger
else delete all TMBI rows
@Task could be changed to use DSQL (group by ADMNO/LEDG_NO) if
normal MAGIC task is too slow, because of selection every BCNB row
for every distinct ADMNO/LEDG_NO, which is not necessary
-- Reset variables
-- Calculate starting v.Balance
-- Perform calculations for every day in the selected period
-- Store new message to MQ for handled ledger

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT cast(sum(BCNB_CHANGESNETBALANCE) as decimal (13,2)) FROM :1/BCNB WHERE BCNB_ADMNO = :2 and BCNB_LEDG_NO = :3 and BCNB_VALUEDATE < ':4' FOR FETCH ONLY

Text.val: -- Number of possible loops = number of days in the selected period from
PI.START_DATE until PI.END_DATE
-- INFO: Not always necessary that a BCNB row exist for each day in the selected
period, then v.Balance does not change
-- Add 1 day to get the next date in the selected period of PI.START_DATE and
PI.END_DATE
